channel.title: Praybook goes back to normal when relogging
channel.description:
I am using trisidiax source. When i pray at the altar so i get curses praybook, and then i relog it changes back to the normal praybook. And when i try to click on something it says "you are not on the right prayerbook"
How can i change it so the praybook won't change back to normal? :confused:

item.title: Praybook goes back to normal when relogging
item.dc:creator: @sume sume
